Class ChatServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatServer

  • public class ChatServer
extends java.lang.Object
    ChatServer models a server for a 1-to-N Server-client architechture based chatting room. It will sit on a specified port number waiting for clients to request connections. Once a client is connected to this server, it will keep recieving all the message sent from all connected clients.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ChatServer.MessageCollector
      A Thread class to collect messages from a specified socket.
